item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 05/27/2016 - Huge Upside Breakout! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 05/27/2016 - Huge Upside Breakout! - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price could be due for a test of the $500 mark as bulls pushed it past the ascending triangle resistance. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price could be due for a test of the $500 mark as bulls pushed it past the ascending triangle resistance.

item.title: The DAO Token Holders Need to Evaluate and Criticize Every Proposal They Receive. - The Merkle
item.description:
The DAO Token Holders Need to Evaluate and Criticize Every Proposal They Receive. - The Merkle

The above statement may seem obvious, but The DAO has formally received two proposals by Slock.it UG, Token holders must carefully analyze every proposal they receive, and evaluate the financial viability of these, failure to do so may result in mismanagement of funds and the ultimate failure of the biggest crowdfund sale in the history.

item.title: Arctic15 Is around the Corner, Presents an Ideal Opportunity for Bitcoin Startups - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Arctic15 Is around the Corner, Presents an Ideal Opportunity for Bitcoin Startups - NEWSBTC

Arctic15, the Startup and Entrepreneurship conference of the year is just a week away. The two-day conference aims to promote entrepreneurship by providing a platform for all the stakeholders in the global startup ecosystem to meet in one place. Bitcoin and its underlying technology has been around for a bit more than 7 years.

item.title: Ethereum (ETH) Price Trends: 5/26/2016
item.description:
Ethereum (ETH) Price Trends: 5/26/2016

Ethereum's price continues its downward correction. It is smoothly approaching a decisive resistance line. Ethereum's price has rebounded from the key level of $12.8. As we have assumed a day earlier, that mark has become a good point for traders to make their decisions. So the downward correction continues.

item.title: Kraken Delists Namecoin after Meager Trading Volume
item.description:
Kraken Delists Namecoin after Meager Trading Volume

Bitcoin and digital asset exchange Kraken has ceased Namecoin trading form the exchange after determining that the currency did not warrant the effort to continue support due to low trading volumes. Kraken has revealed that it will not continue to keep or support Namecoin, following an assessment of supported coins in its exchange prior to making certain technical upgrades.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Deconstructing Today's Action - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Deconstructing Today's Action - NEWSBTC

Here's what we are looking at in the bitcoin price this evening, and beyond, out of Europe Its that time again - that's right, time for the second of our twice daily bitcoin price watch articles, and for us to take a look at how action during the European session today is going to influence our strategy for this evening's session out of the US.

item.title: Cash Losing Popularity, Banks Losing Trust - The Time is Ripe for Bitcoin?
item.description:
Cash Losing Popularity, Banks Losing Trust - The Time is Ripe for Bitcoin?

Our society is moving faster and faster towards its cashless future, paradoxically at the same time losing trust in traditional banking. Does it mean that we are ready for Bitcoin? Is it time for it to officially enter the financial scene?

item.title: EU Parliament Approves Proposal for Digital Currency Task Force - CoinDesk
item.description:
EU Parliament Approves Proposal for Digital Currency Task Force - CoinDesk

The European Parliament, the legislative branch of the European Union, has approved a proposal for a task force dedicated to digital currencies and blockchain technology. A report drafted by European Parliament member (MEP) Jakob von Weizs√§cker first began circulating in late February.

item.title: P2P Exchange Bitsquare Adds Support for Gridcoin and 14 Other Digital Currencies, Raises Trade Limits
item.description:
P2P Exchange Bitsquare Adds Support for Gridcoin and 14 Other Digital Currencies, Raises Trade Limits

Bitsquare, one of the most promising P2P digital currency exchange projects, has released a new update today that adds support for several new cryptocurrencies: Monero, Maker, DAO, STEEM, BigUp, PlatinumBar, Jumbucks, Pinkcoin, OKCash, Moin, SolarCoin, Shift, Europecoin, PostCoin and GridCoin.

item.title: Interview With Uphold EVP Global Growth & Partnerships Robin O'Connell
item.description:
Interview With Uphold EVP Global Growth & Partnerships Robin O'Connell

We recently conducted an interview with the Uphold team regarding ng their platform, and how they envision the future of cryptocurrency. Moreover, Uphold EVP Global Growth and Partnerships Robin O'Connell referred to collaborative opportunities for the company. Uphold: At Uphold, we have a Growth & Partnerships team that is working with multiple businesses to help drive users and funds flow within the platform.
